<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

<a name="module_cocmdLivestream"></a>

The cocmdLivestream module represents the state of the current livestream, and allows
to start/stop live streams.


* [cocmdLivestream](#module_cocmdLivestream)
    * [.start()](#module_cocmdLivestream+start)
    * [.stop()](#module_cocmdLivestream+stop)

<a name="module_cocmdLivestream+start"></a>

### meeting.livestream.start()
Starts livestreaming the meeting.

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>cocmdLivestream</code>](#module_cocmdLivestream)  
<a name="module_cocmdLivestream+stop"></a>

### meeting.livestream.stop()
Stops livestreaming the meeting.

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>cocmdLivestream</code>](#module_cocmdLivestream)
